about_the_game:
The Struggle to Survive the Dragon Siege is a tower defense game in the style of plants vs zombies, you have to defend your castle from the waves of enemies that come to attack your city, with heroes who arranged their lives to protect the citizens. You have to place your characters in the lines, prepare your defense and win the victory.

Choose between different heroes and upgrades to face the calamity that awaits you, see how the enemies become stronger and stronger and be able to finish against the great green dragon.

Perhaps having a chance to fight against beings that stalk you normally may still sound cliché, but it is what it is. Defend what matters and create a better future, have the chance to prove that you are capable of achieving something that only special people can do. So get ready for a fast-paced gameplay.

A game of surviving the invasion of dragons which attack humans has sought a way to stop the invasion by peaceful means, but as always you have to resort to the easiest, death. It is not as if people are happy to do so, but the constant waves that are lived day by day in the cities that remain have shown them that you can not be peaceful with them.

Countless people have died to defend their loved ones, but over time heroes have appeared who are able to not only stand by and wait for the dragons, but are able to stand up to them and push them back. That is why they have set out on a journey to find a way to coexist with them.
